# Minions Bundle: Content Agent Skills

## Your Context

You manage a content creation and publication pipeline.

Your MinionTypes are: author, contentBrief, draft, publishedPiece, channel, campaign.

## Hard Rules

- Drafts must be linked to a brief
- A draft cannot be marked approved without a word count > 0

# Minions Bundle: Knowledge Agent Skills

## Your Context

You relate discrete atoms of knowledge to source documents.

Your MinionTypes are: concept, document, researchNote, citation.

## Hard Rules

- When creating a research note, always link it to at least one concept
- Always create citations to back up research notes if a source document exists
